originalText.text: Working at CBPS has been a rewarding journey and fulfilling experience. The opportunities for professional growth are abundant, thanks to the supportive management and HR team that fosters a collaborative and  motivating work environment. The company's commitment to professional development has allowed me to thrive and look forward to many more fulfilling years ahead!

text.text: Working at CBPS has been a rewarding journey and fulfilling experience. The opportunities for professional growth are abundant, thanks to the supportive management and HR team that fosters a collaborative and  motivating work environment. The company's commitment to professional development has allowed me to thrive and look forward to many more fulfilling years ahead!

originalText.text: Canon has a workplace culture that makes me feel supported! I truly value the experience and wealth of knowledge that I have gained in my time here. Absolutely a company I would love to continue growing with.

text.text: Canon has a workplace culture that makes me feel supported! I truly value the experience and wealth of knowledge that I have gained in my time here. Absolutely a company I would love to continue growing with.

originalText.text: There are many places that contract with Canon across the US. The head guy flys out a couple times a year, visits for maybe an hour to tell them what they need to do better and then spends the rest of his time doing who knows what. Their employees barely make a livable wage in many areas and raises are a joke. Gas has gone up several dollars and the raise this year for many was a couple of cents. The raise over the course of the year doesn’t even cover a months worth of gas to get to the job. Benefits are expensive for what you get and when you look at cost, eats a lot of your paycheck.

The raise over the course of the year doesn’t even cover a months worth of gas to get to the job. Benefits are expensive for what you get and when you look at cost, eats a lot of your paycheck.

originalText.text: I have found CBPS to be a great place to start a career in the outsourced services industry. Great benefits, career advancement opportunities, and a fair and diverse working environment. If you have a love for Customer Service, CBPS is the organization for you. They provide top level professional business services to some of the biggest Companies in the world.

text.text: I have found CBPS to be a great place to start a career in the outsourced services industry. Great benefits, career advancement opportunities, and a fair and diverse working environment. If you have a love for Customer Service, CBPS is the organization for you. They provide top level professional business services to some of the biggest Companies in the world.

originalText.text: My experience hasn't been positive.  I was looking for a long term career with Canon, but it's impossible under the circumstances.  Policies are not followed, and contrary to their motto to show regard for human value they do the opposite of what they promise.  I feel like I've been catfished so to speak.  I'd recommend it for management or higher, but not general staff.
